experiences.title: Volunteer, Zakat Foundation of America (2019-2022)
description: Collaborated with volunteers and staff to improve donation and event workflows
Assisted in outreach efforts during the COVID-19 pandemic to support struggling individuals and families
Managed, sorted, and folded hundreds of donated items including clothing, food, and household goods
Maintained organization and cleanliness of donation areas to ensure efficient distribution
Organized and participated in community fundraising events to collect essential goods and raise financial support

experiences.title: Volunteer, NCSU Spring Career Fair (Fall 2023)
description: Set up tables and materials for 100+ attending employers
Provided onsite assistance to employers throughout the event
Worked in a team to clean up, organize leftover materials, and dispose of trash efficiently
